segments.text: I have a question about my cable .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I haven't been able to watch my cable for the past week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right now the cable isn't working .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you tell me when it will be back on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The cable should be running again in a couple of days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In the meantime , do I still have to pay for the cable ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'll just give you a credit for the inconvenience .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does that mean I won't have to pay for it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It'll be free until it comes back on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for all your patience .
segments.speaker: S2
